Any plans to make it possible to create invoices from the company card with the account extension? It's very limiting when you only can create invoices from deals. We're creating an app using the accounting extension and have customers in private beta requesting to create invoices from the company card and tickets. For clarification, I'm talking about creating from scratch, not a quote.
